setupaccount.name: setupaccount
setupaccount.description: Set up an account to use with the SuiteCloud CLI for Node.js.

localserver.name: localserver
localserver.description: Generate a local server of your extensions and themes. This set of compiled files is stored in your SuiteApp project folder and the server is located on port 7777.

options.name: theme
options.description: Specify the theme you want to include in your local build. The XML object must be added in the objects tag within the deploy.xml file. You can only specify one theme.

options.name: extensions
options.description: Specify the extension you want to include in your local build. The XML object must be added in the objects    tag within the deploy.xml file. You can specify several extensions.

options.name: set
options.description: Enter the URL of the server you want to use as your proxy. For example, http://my-proxy-domain:80

options.name: clear
options.description: Remove the last proxy server you set.
